On Tuesday 08 June 2004 11:27 pm, John Miller wrote:
> Hi All,
>
> I've got a class method that writes out a (text) file.
>
> Given a known input how can I test that the output is correct.
>
> I'm using ANT to run my test cases.

If you don't have the liberty to implement it the way Curt Sampson mentioned 
(with readers and writers, which I also prefer) you can test against a master 
by doing file comparison.

-- 
Jason Rogers
